title: Which pronoun should we use for God? - Quora

response.answer_text: We should use the pronouns He used for Himself, what His prophets used addressing or speaking about Him or their modern-equivalents in spoken languages. Honestly, I find it odd that many of those who object to using a pronoun on someone without their consent, would do so to God. Of course, my answer is based on Abrahamic religions.
